meanings.definition: The act of specializing to an extreme degree.
meanings.sent1: His superspecializations in medicine made him a sought-after expert.
meanings.sent2: She focused on superspecializations in technology to advance her career.
meanings.sent3: The competition for superspecializations in baking was fierce at the county fair.
meanings.sent4: Her superspecializations in gardening bloomed like a beautiful flower in spring.
meanings.sent5: The concept of superspecializations in art was introduced during the workshop.

meanings.definition: A specific area of expertise within a specialized field.
meanings.sent1: The conference highlighted various superspecializations in engineering.
meanings.sent2: He chose to pursue superspecializations in finance to enhance his skills.
meanings.sent3: The museum showcased unique superspecializations in ancient history.
meanings.sent4: Her superspecializations in music resonated with the audience.
meanings.sent5: The book delved into the fascinating world of superspecializations in astronomy.
